about_the_game:
Doppelscape combines the deckbuilding of Slay the Spire with the tactical game play of Into the Breach.

Features

  • Team-based strategy: Play a team of three characters. Build decks that with synergy across the whole team and balance each other's strengths and weaknesses. Each character has unique cards, mechanics, and strategy.


  • Hex-based tactics: Positioning matters. Push, pull, shove, and teleport your enemies into position for a devastating area of effect attack. Position your characters in range of buffs and out of harms way. Use the terrain to your advantage by taking up defensive positions or discovering location based bonuses.


  • Dynamic Deckbuilding: Build your deck each run as you attempt to escape from Doppelscape. Choose from hundreds of cards. Discover unique synergies and builds. But make sure you have the power to survive until your combos come together.


  • Unique relic system: Find equipment that drastically alters game play and deckbuilding decisions. Items must be equipped in specific slots such as head, chest, or software.
